title: Chicken, mango and avocado couscous salad
ingredients: ['175g couscous', '2 sprigs fresh mint, stemmed and chopped', '2 sprigs coriander, chopped', '500ml boiling water', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '1 tablespoon paprika', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '1 large green pepper, chopped', '1 large red pepper, chopped', '1 mango, cubed', '1 avocado, cubed', '1 small bunch watercress', '40g crumbled feta cheese', '3 tablespoons low-fat yogurt']
